juiceboxProjectID.name: Mainnet NFT Collection ID
juiceboxProjectID.description: Your collection ID is the ID of your Juicebox project where your collection is configured. Your site will record posts onto this collection by default.

defaultNFTCategory.name: Mainnet NFT Category
defaultNFTCategory.description: The category within your collection where posts will be recorded by default.

ethereumRPC.name: Mainnet RPC
ethereumRPC.description: A URL where your site will access onchain data from.

ethAddress.name: Mainnet address
ethAddress.description: The address where $CPN resulting from your site's recorded posts will be sent.
